name: Ink and Eggs
description:
Ink and Eggs is a bullet-hell/dodge game inspired by the GoDot's Dodge2D "Dodge The Creeps" tutorial. This is my first game, my first attempt at making my own music, illustrating my own art, and my first experience with the Godot engine.

This game is for PC (Keyboard) only. At this time I plan no further updates on this project but am willing to attempt a touch screen/Mobile phone version if there is genuine interest.

Thank you for checking out my game!

Credits: Development, production, and music by Maelstronando.
